name: SYS_BREACH
description:
In a world of robots with lasers and iron fists (literally), you are the mind of a human transported into one such entity. It's your job to destroy as many other robots as possible by invading their systems, and pave the way for a revolution.

There are three types of robot that you'll encounter:

The Charger, who will throw short-range punches at you, then dash through you

...though it's not very smart, and likes to get stuck in walls

The Circler, who will shoot at you from a distance, then fire an exploding bullet

...though it's pretty slow, and it's special bullet only explodes on walls

The Sentry, who will fire at you from a distance, then unleash a torrent of lasers in a cone

...though it can't move, and is an easy target

But be warned, with every kill you switch bodies, your mind passed on between systems (like a torch, perhaps?), and so you have to always consider the fact that you will never be the same for long. It's lucky you heal whenever switching, though.

Thus, it's now up to you. How long can you survive the SYS_BREACH?

This has been our first game jam, so any feedback is welcome (expect many bugs). Thanks to Teknoaxe for the royalty free music we used.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 168: 'Pass the Torch'
